headline: Piper Sandler cuts Synopsys and Bentley Systems on growth risks
summary: Investing.com -- Piper Sandler downgraded Synopsys and Bentley Systems, warning that long-running growth drivers at both companies could face pressure in 2026 as industry dynamics shift.

raw.headline: Piper Sandler cuts Synopsys and Bentley Systems on growth risks
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Piper Sandler downgraded Synopsys and Bentley Systems, warning that long-running growth drivers at both companies could face pressure in 2026 as industry dynamics shift.

headline: Here Are Tuesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Adobe, AMD, Disney, Five Below, Intel, Reddit, KLA Corp, PayPal, Super Micro Computer and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: The futures are trending higher after the December consumer price index came in at 2.6% below Wall Street expectations. The reversal in the futures comes after a wild Monday that saw stocks get hammered on the open, amid news of Department of Justice subpoenas sent to Federal Reserve Chairman Jay Powell regarding ... Here Are Tuesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Adobe, AMD, Disney, Five Below, Intel, Reddit, KLA Corp, PayPal, Super Micro Computer and More

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Tuesday
summary: The S&P 500 is on track for a positive open as Wall Street weighs consumer inflation data.
